page.title: 15Religion. St. Mary's Church.
page.content: {St.Mary's Church. Great Baddow. St.Mary's Church is the oldest building in Great Baddow.It is about {1,000 years}old.When the Domesday book was written in 1086 there was already some kind of church there. Originally the church was quite small.You can still see where the church was first built by the stone arches around the centre part. There are commemorative plaques to the dead of the First and Second World Wars. We found the name Matthams which belongs to two boys in our school.There is an eagle lectern. It is a stand from which people read the Bible.On the walls of the church there are memorial plaques on which people's names are engraved.They are people who worshipped in the church. {
